TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerDataConnection extends System.Object

summary.span: 在设计工具中表示到数据存储区的连接。

span.span: Represents a connection to a data store in a design tool.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示与设计工具中的数据存储区的连接。The object represents a connection to a data store in the design tool. 通常 ，对象作为属性的一部分返回 ，可通过读取应用程序的配置文件或通过调用方法来创建 。Typically a object is returned as part of the property, and is created either by reading the application's configuration file or by calling the method.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数可以创建 不是从应用程序的配置文件创建的对象。Use this constructor to create objects that are not created from the application's configuration file. 使用此构造函数时， 属性将设置为 `false` 。When you use this constructor, the property is set to `false`.

summary.span: 用指定的名称、数据提供程序和连接字符串，并指示连接是否是从配置文件加载的，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name, data provider, and connection string, and indicates whether the connection was loaded from a configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要指定属性的值 （例如， 从存储在应用程序的配置文件中的信息创建对象时），请使用此构造函数。Use this constructor when you need to specify the value of the property, such as when you are creating a object from information stored in the application's configuration file. 此 属性设置为参数的值 `isConfigured` 。The property is set to the value of the `isConfigured` parameter.

summary.span: 获取为连接定义的应用程序连接字符串。

span.span: Gets the application connection string defined for the connection.

value.span: 为连接定义的应用程序连接字符串。

span.span: The application connection string defined for the connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含应用程序用于连接到数据存储区的连接字符串。The property contains the connection string used by the application for connecting to the data store. 您必须使用 方法来返回适合在设计环境中使用的连接字符串。You must use the method to return a connection string suitable for use in the design environment.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示连接信息是否在应用程序的配置文件中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the connection information is in the application's configuration file.

value.span: 如果连接是在应用程序的配置文件中定义的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the connection is defined in the application's configuration file; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 如果该 对象是从应用程序的配置文件中读取的，或者如果该 对象是由方法写入到应用程序的配置文件中的，则属性将为 。The property will be `true` if the object was read from the application's configuration file, or if the object was written to the application's configuration file by the method. 当 为时 `true` ， 属性将设置为配置文件的 [ConnectionStrings 元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bf7sd233(v=vs.100)) 中定义的连接名称。When the is `true`, the property is set to the name of the connection as defined in the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bf7sd233(v=vs.100)) of the configuration file.

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

span.span: Gets the name of the data connection.
The name of the data connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含标识应用程序配置文件或数据连接列表中特定连接的名称。The property contains the name that identifies a specific connection in an application configuration file or a list of data connections. 当 属性为时 `true` ， 属性将用作 `name` connectionStrings 元素中的属性 [ (ASP.NET 设置架构) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bf7sd233(v=vs.100)) 配置元素，或从 方法返回。When the property is `true`, property is used as the `name` attribute in the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bf7sd233(v=vs.100)) configuration element, or is returned from the method.
